page.title: 09Ghosts in Bromsgrove (3)
page.content: Someone was looking at themselves in the mirror when they saw the ghost behind them.Once a barmaid went to get something from the back and she saw the ghost.The ghost is supposed to be friendly.On Sundays he is supposed to come to the Black Cross at exactly 14:15. {THE COUNTRY GIRL The ghost of the Country Girl first appeared when the pub was short on customers.Some people think that the ghost is of the man who built the pub.The residents of the pub first found out that they were being haunted when the sign outside the pub saying The Country Girl was mysteriously found about 200 yards up the road from the pub.Many people who go to the pub late at night have seen this ghost. Some people think the ghost is of a young girl dressed in grey.
